name: BNNSLayerParametersFullyConnected
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a fully connected layer.

items.name: init(i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, w_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, bias: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, activation: BNNSActivation)
items.desc: Returns a new fully connected layer parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new fully connected layer parameters structure.

items.name: var activation: BNNSActivation
items.desc: The activation function that the layer applies to the output.
